sen.j: 比売神（ひめのかみ）は、神道の神 (神道)である。
sen.e: "Hime no kami" is a Shinto god.
"Hime no kami" is a Shinto god.
Hime no kami is a Shinto god (Shinto).

sen.j: 神社の祭神を示すときに、主祭神と並んで比売神（比売大神）、比咩神などと書かれる。
sen.e: When describing the enshrined deity of a shrine, it is written Hime no kami (Hime-okami), Himeno-kami, etc., along with the shusaijin (main enshrined deities).
When describing the enshrined deity of a shrine, it is written Hime no kami (Hime-okami), Himeno-kami, etc., along with the shusaijin (main enshrined deities).
When describing the enshrined deity of a shrine, it is written 比売神 (Hime no Kami) (比売大神 (Hime Okami)), 比咩神 (Hime no Kami), etc., along with the shusaijin (main enshrined deities)

sen.j: これは特定の神の名前ではなく、神社の主祭神の妻や娘、あるいは関係の深い女神を指すものである。
sen.e: This is not the name of a specific god, but refers to the wife or daughter of the shusaijin of the shrine or a goddess with strong ties.
This is not the name of a specific god, but refers to the wife or daughter of the shusaijin of the shrine or a goddess with strong ties.
This is not the name of a specific god, but refers to the wife or daughter of the shusaijin of the shrine or a goddess with strong ties.

sen.j: 最も有名な比売神は八幡神の比売大神である。
sen.e: The most famous Hime no kami is the Hime-okami of Hachimanshin (God of War).
The most famous Hime no kami is the Hime-okami of Hachimanshin (God of War).
The most famous Hime no Kami is the Hime Okami of Hachimanshin (God of War).
sen.cmt: 神名表現を統一しました。

sen.j: 宇佐神宮ほかではこれは宗像三神のことであるとしているが、八幡社の比売大神の正体については諸説ある。
sen.e: At Usa-jingu Shrine and other shrines, it is considered that this refers to the Munakata three gods, but there are many theories on the true identity of Hime-okami at Hachiman-sha Shrine.
At Usa-jingu Shrine and other shrines, it is considered that this refers to the Munakata three gods, but there are many theories on the true identity of Hime-okami at Hachiman-sha Shrine.
At Usa-jingu Shrine and other shrines, it is considered that this refers to the Munakata three gods, but there are many theories on the true identity of Hime Okami at Hachiman-sha Shrine.
sen.cmt: 神名表現を統一しました。

sen.j: 春日大社に祀られる比売神はアメノコヤネ（あめのこやねのみこと）の妻の天美津玉照比売命（あめのみつたまてるひめのみこと）である。
sen.e: Hime no kami enshrined at Kasuga-taisha Shrine is the wife of Amenokoyane (Amenokoyane no mikoto), Amenomitsutamateruhime no mikoto.
Hime no kami enshrined at Kasuga-taisha Shrine is the wife of Amenokoyane (Amenokoyane no mikoto), Amenomitsutamateruhime no mikoto.
Hime no Kami enshrined at Kasuga-taisha Shrine is the wife of Amenokoyane (Amenokoyane no Mikoto), Amenomitsutamateruhime no Mikoto.
sen.cmt: 神名表現を統一しました。

sen.j: 大日孁貴尊（アマテラス）を比売神としている神社もある。
sen.e: Some shrines enshrine Ohirumemuchi-no-mikoto (Amaterasu) as Hime no kami.
Some shrines enshrine Ohirumemuchi-no-mikoto (Amaterasu) as Hime no kami.
Some shrines enshrine Ohirumemuchi no Mikoto (Amaterasu) as Hime no Kami.
sen.cmt: 神名表現を統一しました。

sen.j: 比売神を主祭神としており、日本各地にある。
sen.e: It exists nationwide in Japan, with Hime no kami as the shusaijin.
It exists nationwide in Japan, with Hime no kami as the shusaijin.
It exists nationwide in Japan, with Hime no Kami as the shusaijin.
sen.cmt: 神名表現を統一しました。

sen.j: 単純に「比売神社」と呼ばれるものは他の神社の摂末社であることが多い。
sen.e: Those simply called 'Hime-jinja Shrine' are often the Setsumatsu sha (smaller shrine managed under the shrine) of other shrines.
Those simply called 'Hime-jinja Shrine' are often the Setsumatsu sha (smaller shrine managed under the shrine) of other shrines.
Those simply called 'Hime-jinja Shrine' are often the Setsumatsu sha (smaller shrine managed under the shrine) of other shrines.

sen.cmt: コロンを追加しました。

sen.e: - Sessha (auxiliary shrine (dedicated to a deity close-related to that of a main shrine)) of Nantokagami-jinja Shrine
- Sessha (auxiliary shrine (dedicated to a deity close-related to that of a main shrine)) of Nantokagami-jinja Shrine

sen.cmt: ハイフンを削除しました。

sen.j: 村屋坐弥冨都比売神社
